cosmos-anonymous:
The text that shows instead of a username in the top banner if the user is not logged in.

{{Identical|Anonymous}}
cosmos-counter-label: The label for the article counter in wiki navigation. Uses Plural:$1.
cosmos-createpage-header: The header for the create page pop-up dialogue.
cosmos-createpage-input-label: The new page's name input label.
cosmos-createpage-next: The create page dialogue submit/next button label.
cosmos-createpage-dialoge-text: The text that appears underneath the input to enter new page name, in create page dialogue, as a label to the article proposals. The first $1 instance should be wrapped in tags. Uses Plural:$1 for the second $1 instance.
cosmos-personaltools-userpage:
The link text for user page in personal tools.

{{Identical|User page}}
cosmos-personaltools-usertalk: The link text for a logged in user's talk page in personal tools.
cosmos-personaltools-anontalk: The link text for an anonymous user's talk page in personal tools.
cosmos-notifications-nomessages: The text that displays if the user has no new talk page notifications and the Echo extension is not enabled.
cosmos-notifications-nonotifs: The text that displays if the user has no new alerts and the Echo extension is not enabled.
cosmos-action-addsection:
The new topic link text displayed on talk pages.

{{Identical|New topic}}
cosmos-action-cancel:
The label for the action cancel buttons.

{{Identical|Cancel}}
cosmos-action-backtopage: The label for the 'Back to $1' button, when the $1 is relevant.
cosmos-action-back:
The label of the back button.

{{Identical|Back}}
cosmos-upload:
The Upload File text used throughout Cosmos.

{{Identical|Upload file}}
cosmos-add-new-page-title: The html title attribute for the add new page button.
cosmos-add-new-page-text:
The label for the add page button if user is logged in.

{{Identical|Add}}
cosmos-anon-add-new-page-text: The label for the add new page button if the user is not logged in.
cosmos-recentchanges:
The recent changes text used throughout Cosmos.

{{Identical|Recent changes}}
cosmos-adminlinks: The html title value for the Admin Links button in the wiki navigation.
cosmos-explore:
The header for the explore tab in the navigation.

{{Identical|Explore}}
prefs-cosmos-responsiveness: The label for the Mobile Responsiveness section in Special:Preferences.
cosmos-mobile-preference: The checkbox label for the mobile responsiveness toggle in Special:Preferences
cosmos-user-blocked:
The text used to show a user is blocked on social profile Pages' avatar area.

{{Identical|Blocked}}
